h2_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit
content: Not only does the ball smash through and create a path for you to take toward the Cooling Slope, but it also lands near The Emerald Hall. From the Emerald Hall Keeper's Shrine, head up the stairs the same you did to continue through the chapter. You'll see the ball slammed into a nearby rock. Approach it, and you can absorb the spirit.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 5 Secrets', specifically from the subsection 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
Not only does the ball smash through and create a path for you to take toward the Cooling Slope, but it also lands near The Emerald Hall. From the Emerald Hall Keeper's Shrine, head up the stairs the same you did to continue through the chapter. You'll see the ball slammed into a nearby rock. Approach it, and you can absorb the spirit.
